Package Model

Class CinemaMovie

java.lang.Object
Model.CinemaMovie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CinemaMovie extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a movie that has been registered for screening in the cinema. Cinema movies can be registered and removed by an app Admin. A cinema movie can be booked by Movie-goers, as well as listed on the app. Cinema movie information can also be modified by an app Admin.
Since:
2022-11-12

    • searchShowTime

      public ShowTime searchShowTime()
      Searches for a particular show time of the Cinema Movie object. Users can select a show time from the list of all availble show times for the cinema movie. Users will input an integer to make their selection.
      Returns:
      ShowTime object that has been selected by the user.

    • updateOverallRating

      public void updateOverallRating()
      Updates the overall reviewer rating of the cinema movie. This method is called whenever a new review is added.

    • isValidShowTime

      public Boolean isValidShowTime(ShowTime st)
      Checks if input show time clashes with other show times that are already in the database.
      Parameters:
      st - The show time that we want to validate.
      Returns:
      true if input show time does not clash with pre-existing show times; returns false if otherwise.
